item.title: Intro to Kafka
item.author: subhashyadavtw@gmail.com (Subhash Yadav)
item.description: In this blog I will try to answer few question that we might have as a beginner. So let’s start with our first question : What is kafka? So let’s think kafka as a central hub that allows someone to host and consume the live data (stream). In kafka’s term the host and consumer will be called producer and consumer respectively. There can be multiple producer and consumer to it.
